title: Matchsafe, "Elephant and Palms", late 19th century
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Elongated oval form, featuring raised decoration of palm trees and elephant, reverse features palm, and other foliage and unidentified animal. Link on top. Front opens, hinged on right side. Striker extends around perimeter.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Elephant and Palms", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-1101.
